questions.question: Expression for equivalent stiffness of the system when a mass is attached between two springs whose stiffnesses are k<sub>1</sub> and k<sub>2</sub> respectively?
What is the expression for restoring force when both springs are displaced by a distance x?
In a coupled spring mass system where the mass is attached between two spings, if the stiffness of the springs are 5N/m and 7N/m respectively, find the equivalent stiffness of the system(in N/m)
The number of cycles per unit time is called the _____ of vibration.
A body is said to undergo free vibration, when?

answers.b: It vibrates freely with no force acting on it
answers.c: The force causing the initial displacement is removed
answers.d: It vibrates freely with no resistive force acting on it
